mapper.select: select * from ( select homework.*,rownum rn from ( SELECT g.sname, m.memail, m.mphone, m.mbirthdate, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(m.mbirthdate)) / 12) AS age, g.studentid, g.pkgid, g.groupid FROM groupStudent g JOIN member m ON g.studentid = m.memberid where g.GROUPJOINSTATUS = 'Y' ) homework where groupid = #{groupid} ) where rn between #{startNo} and #{endNo}

select count(*) FROM (SELECT g.sname, m.memail, m.mphone, m.mbirthdate, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(m.mbirthdate)) / 12) AS age, g.groupid FROM groupStudent g JOIN member m ON g.studentid = m.memberid) where groupid = #{groupid}
select h.*,pkgname ,mname from homework h join package p on h.pkgid = p.pkgid join member m on m.memberid = h.memberid where studentid = #{studentid}
mapper.update: UPDATE homework SET submitdate = sysdate, studycont = #{studycont} where homeworkno = #{homeworkno}
